remarks: A lattice plane (or lattice line or atom) cannot majorize a lattice volume.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lvolnle3at.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lvolnle3at.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lvolnle3at.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lvolnle3at.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
lvolnle3at $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. V ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> -. X .<_ ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ R ) ) $.
